sidebar.supporterMessage: Please consider becoming a <emphasis>Supporter</emphasis> to keep the project alive!

updateAnnouncer.newVersion: A new version of the extension is available!
updateAnnouncer.updatePrompt: Please update to receive enhancements and bug fixes.
updateAnnouncer.autoUpdateInfo: The upgrade should be happening automatically when you restart the browser, or force it to manually update in the extension management page.
updateAnnouncer.manualUpdateInfo: Or click <storeLink>HERE</storeLink> to revisit the store and manually reinstall the extension if none of the above works (remember to export your settings!).
